short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Configurable automatic download path switcher for customizable file types and folders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to define folder names and assign specific file types to each folder, so files are automatically sorted as they download. This will help keep your download folder tidy and well-organized!

Next feature in planning:
~ Create Your Own Folders
